title: IRL PvP
description:
"I really wanted to meet you, hubby."
'Woo Seungjae', a challenger who never loses even to pro gamers, is single and has never dated. Tempted by the promise of a blind date if he helps someone rank up, he heads to an internet cafe, only to end up in an irl pvp. But what starts as a scuffle turns into a twist of fate.... Suddenly, Seungjae finds his life spiraling into game-like happenings filled with unexpected encounters!
author: Tam
